resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73890</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73890</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>dd0f1e52-d42a-4ae0-a5e6-e9e420c88b5e#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szem alkalmazkodása a távolsághoz</string>
            <string language="en">Eye's accomodation to the distance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anpassung des Auges an den Abstand</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le logement de l'oeil à la distance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Acomodação do olho à distância</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistemazione dell'occhio alla distanza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στέγαση ματιού στην απόσταση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comodidad del ojo a la distancia</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szemlencse fénytörésének változása közeli és távoli tárgyak nézésekor.</string>
            <string language="en">Changing of crystalline lens's refraction of light looking at subjects near and far.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szem,  látás,  lencse,  homorú,  domború,  </string>
            <string language="en">eye, sight, lens, concave, convex</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern der Brechung des kristallenen Objektivs 
des Lichtes Themen nahe und weit betrachtend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changer de la réfraction de l'objectif cristallin
de la lumière regardant des sujets presque et loin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança do refraction da lente cristalina da luz
que olha assuntos próximo e distante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiando della rifrazione dell'obiettivo 
cristallino di luce che guarda gli oggetti vicino e lontano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγή της διάθλασης του κρυστάλλινου φακού του φωτός
που εξετάζει τα θέματα πλησίον και μακριά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El cambiar de la refracción de la lente 
cristalina de la luz que mira temas cerca y lejos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auge, Anblick, Objektiv, konkav, konvex</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oeil, vue, objectif, concave, convexe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olho, vista, lente, côncavo, convexa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">occhio, vista, obiettivo, concavo, convesso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μάτι, θέα, φακός, κοίλος, κυρτός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ojo, vista, lente, cóncavo, convexa</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73890</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>

    <item>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
